TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlEvidence extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the evidence used to render an authorization decision for a security token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authorized to access a specific resource. The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>. An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence> class represents the evidence used by a SAML authority to render an authorization decision for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>. The evidence is specified as SAML assertions or a reference to SAML assertions, which refer to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
## Examples <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this constructor when you have a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects, but no SAML assertion references.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssertionIdReferences As IList(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Docs.value: An of type that contains identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Assertions As IList(Of SamlAssertion)

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of SAML assertions that comprise the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Docs.value: An of type that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `<saml:Assertion>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
